    final class Controls
extends android.widget.MediaController
    Need to create a custom MediaController, because by default it's drawn on top of everything, including the drawer...

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show(int timeout)
        Override showing the controls, by simply showing the FrameLayout. Will be automatically hidden when timeout expires.
        Overrides:
        show in class android.widget.MediaController
        Parameters:
        timeout - delay in milliseconds before the controls disappear

      • show

        public void show()
        Override showing the controls, by simply showing the FrameLayout. Will be automatically hidden when SHOW_TIMEOUT timeout expires.
        Overrides:
        show in class android.widget.MediaController

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Override hiding the controls by hiding the FrameLayout
        Overrides:
        hide in class android.widget.MediaController

      • isShowing

        public boolean isShowing()
        Important to call the View's method not the MediaController's
        Overrides:
        isShowing in class android.widget.MediaController
        Returns:
        true if the controls are currently shown, false otherwise.
